oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States--History--Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865 -- Registers, lists, etc.; Tennessee -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; United States -- Army
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A handwritten roster of the commissioned officers of the 2nd Tennessee Cavalry Volunteers. Roster includes name of member, rank, and miscellaneous remarks.
This regiment was also known as the 2nd East Tennessee Cavalry. The unit organized in East Tennessee from July - November 1862 and mustered out at Nashville on July 6, 1865.
